704129f-a.title: Brooklyn: Emmons Avenue - Ford Street
704129f-a.text:
Emmons Auenue, east from Ford Street toward Plumb Beach,
where it merges into the Shore Parkway section of the Belt Park-
way. This is the north lane of the avenue.
June 13, 1940
P. L. Sperr
704129f-a.folder: Emmons Avenue & Ford Street, Brooklyn, NY

704130f-a.title: Brooklyn: Emmons Avenue - Ford Street
704130f-a.text:
(1)
3127-29 Emmons Ave., north side, between Ford and Coyle Streets.
Houses concerned are frame.
JV1y 13, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, a more complete view, showing the Seaview rooming house.
December 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

704131f-a.title: Brooklyn: Emmons Avenue - Ford Street
704131f-a.text:
3131 Emmons Ave., north side, between Ford and Coyle Streets. A
view of an old frame house.
July 13, 1933.
